about_the_game:
Rotation Based Precision-Platforming

Twist lithely as you hurtle through space, aligning your trajectory to leap perfectly through tiny gaps, lest you fling yourself carelessly into the jagged rocks.

Tight Single-Screen Chambers

Launch across rooms, graze past danger, squeeze through passages and bounce frantically between platforms in over 50 of hand-crafted rooms.

Unique Environmental Mechanics

Swim through water, leaping between ponds, drift through void while evading ancient machines, cling to moving platforms, releasing just before they collide.

What else?

  • Over 50 hand-crafted levels

  • 7 Chapters, each introducing something new

  • Focused, 3-button gameplay

  • Repeated death

  • Below the soil are ruins, below the ruins are tombs, and below the tombs is... a factory.

Art by Kenney
Music By HoliznaCC0
name: PogoPogo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Twist and bounce through dozens of tight single-screen chambers. Splash through rapids, float through space, watch helplessly as your pogo-bound body hurtles into the jagged rocks. Try again, in this frenetic, 1-bit, precision platformer.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
